definition.text: This book will walk you through everything you need to know about the Docs.

paragraphs.text: I->Superalgos->Topic->Docs Basics->Read Chapter I to learn the basic concepts; the foundation that will help you understand the commands and styles explained later in the book.

II->Superalgos->Topic->Docs Commands->The Docs include a powerful command line interface that allows you to quickly fire commands from the search box. Dive into Chapter II to learn the details of each command.
